content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 17 (APP):Acts of Kindness Pakistan, a youth-led volunteer organisation, on Friday successfully completed the third phase of aWinter Drive 2025a by distributing quilts among the homeless labourers at the multi-purpose ground, Sector G-11, Islamabad. The campaign aimed to distribute hundreds of quilts and blankets to individuals living on the streets and sleeping on the footpaths in various parts of the city. aThese workers endure harsh winter conditions, and community support is their only lifeline,a said Atique Afridi, founder of Acts of Kindness Pakistan. aWe are committed to providing them with the help they need during this difficult time.a The winter campaign is part of the organisationas ongoing efforts to assist marginalised communities in Islamabad
